channel.title: Oldschool PK ~~~~ frostiescape base
channel.description:
[center] [shadow=red,left][size=36pt]FROSTIESCAPE PK[/size][/shadow]
welcome to Frostiescape PK this is an oldschool type of pking server
basically im doing some old 317 coding and seeing what i can come up with!!
added dicing!
added donator ring that give 5 pkp per kill instead of 1!
added a couple custom items that arent OP!
I NEED STAFF MEMBERS AND PLAYERS TO HELP WITH THE BETA, ALL BETA ACCOUNTS GET BETA STATUS WHEN GAME IS FULLY RELEASED! NO ACCOUNT RESETS!
this server has had many ups and downs im sure many people remember this server but this time we are back for a long time and i need a new bunch of dedicated staff members!
well be hosting many drop parties and the beta is beginning now all members will have donator status for the first week or so while i try to make the game as good as it can be!
will be doing drop parties and releasing retired items during the 1 week beta! (accounts will not be reset)
so come check us out!
--commands-- ::tank ::pure ::master
--pictures-- [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img341/8586/pkpshop.jpg[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img838/5638/homemi.jpg[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img600/7524/overloads.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img832/2816/banner1ee.jpg[/img]
--npcs-- adding many bosses for great loots
--donations-- Donar status and ring -- 10M rsgp
(ring give 5 pkp per kill instead of 1 pkp)
Dicer status -- 10M rsgp
--client-- http://www.mediafire.com/?6eq3dw8b2atihrp
--forums-- http://frostiescapepvp.webs.com/[/center]

item.title: Oldschool PK ~~~~ frostiescape base
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:4, topic:462670”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=565871.msg4115986#msg4115986 date=1349041502]
So you’re basically attempting to sell virtual goods for currency? You’ll add statistics to a Whip for $$? You should just go ahead and make special rings for donors that makes them invincible. Also, make it keep over everything on death and don’t tell your public players about it. Sell hidden statistics to accounts, you’ll make money. There’s some advice for you since this is all about the Benjamin for you. Hell, go ahead and sell Staff positions while you’re at it.
[/quote]
this[/quote]

thanks for the bump clearly you didnt read my post? i removed all that shit.

Read full topic
